home.title: Hi, I'm Onur!
home.description: In my many years of working in software development, I have not only developed a deep understanding of complex software architectures, but have also acquired broad expertise in various programming languages. This experience enables me to design and implement not only innovative but also practice-oriented solutions. As an experienced software developer, I have not only worked successfully in various technology stacks, but also managed projects. This dual role has enabled me not only to overcome technical challenges, but also to develop a clear vision for the integration of software solutions into larger project contexts. I am characterized by my ambition and curiosity. As a highly motivated and eager learner, I am always willing to expand my knowledge and skills in a hands-on environment. My strong analytical skills enable me to quickly identify problems and develop effective solutions.

skills.frontend-text: It's not just HTML, CSS and JavaScript like it used to be. I love this part when I can prepare data visually.
skills.backend-text: This is where the data for the frontend is prepared. I can live clean code and clean architecture here!
skills.devops-text: A part of the work that should not be underestimated. Often the guarantor of project success.
